body_html:
@ispirmustafa I have update a latest code, the python version I used is python3.5.2, and I have test once and reproduce the issue.
the environment is

  • python 3.5.2
  • tensorflow 1.3 or 1.4

Some Chinese comments cause the code to no longer run under python2 and if you need to test in python2 you need to comment out these Chinese comments
body_text:

body:
@ispirmustafa I have update a latest [code](https://github.com/WenmuZhou/Segmentation-Free_OCR), the python version I used is python3.5.2, and I have test once and reproduce the issue.
the environment is
 
* python 3.5.2
* tensorflow 1.3 or 1.4

Some Chinese comments cause the code to no longer run under python2 and if you need to test in python2 you need to comment out these Chinese comments
